entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries in the morning and ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
